titleInfo.title: USA v. Padron
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION and ORDER to Vacate Trial Date and Set Motions Schedule and Hearing as to Jose Eriberto Padron, signed by District Judge Anthony W. Ishii on 10/27/2014. (Defense Motion to Suppress to be filed by 11/17/2014, Government opposition to be filed by 12/22/2014, any reply to be filed by 1/7/2015, Motion to Suppress Hearing set for 1/12/2015, at 10:00 AM in Courtroom 2 (AWI) before District Judge Anthony W. Ishii. The Trial Confirmation Hearing set 11/3/2014 and Jury Trial set 11/18/2014 are ORDERED VACATED.) (Gaumnitz, R)
